Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Side effects of hysterosalpingography with Dimer - X , Hexabrix , Vasurix polyvidone and Endografine in 142 consecutive patients , receiving one of the four tested media were evaluated from replies to postal questionnaires .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Dimer-X |
| Hexabrix |
| Vasurix polyvidone |
| Endografine |

The "Disease" entities in the paragraph are the names of the four media (contrast agents) used in hysterosalpingography that were being evaluated for potential side effects. These are Dimer-X, Hexabrix, Vasurix polyvidone, and Endografine.
